name: InsaneJournal: Pink - login, no banner
description:
For use with the IJ Skins: Class Adder [ http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/11289 ] Greasemonkey script - it won't work without it.  Find Greasemonkey here [ https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/748 ].

Meant to be used with Hand, will look awful on others.  Adapted from [http://userstyles.org/styles/3152] by furiosity.  Another version is available without the banner or login that will work with other schemes.
